Data Pipeline (admet.data)¶

The admet.data package manages the data lifecycle. It includes modules for downloading raw datasets, standardizing chemical structures, generating fingerprints, and creating reproducible training splits.

Data Subpackage¶

Dataset constants, chemistry utilities, and data loading functionality.

class admet.data.DatasetInfo[source]

Bases: TypedDict

Type definition for dataset information.

output_file: str
type: str
uri: str

admet.data.canonicalize_smiles(smiles, isomeric=True)[source]

Canonicalise a single SMILES string with salt removal.

The function performs parsing, removes salts, checks for an empty molecule, and converts back to a canonical SMILES string. Failures are logged at DEBUG level and returned as None.

Parameters:

  • smiles (str) – Input raw SMILES string; None returns None immediately.

  • isomeric (bool, optional) – Preserve isomeric information (isomericSmiles), by default True.

Returns:

Canonical SMILES string or None if parsing / cleaning fails or the molecule becomes empty after salt stripping.

Return type:

Optional[str]

Raises:

None – All errors are caught and converted to None; unexpected RDKit exceptions during salt removal are logged and suppressed.

admet.data.compute_molecular_properties(smiles)[source]

Compute common physico‑chemical properties for SMILES strings.

Invalid SMILES rows are skipped silently. The function returns a tidy DataFrame suitable for merging back onto an existing table by SMILES.

Parameters:

smiles (Iterable[str]) – Iterable of (possibly repeated) SMILES strings.

Returns:

DataFrame with columns [SMILES, MW, TPSA, HBA, HBD, RotBonds, LogP, NumHeavyAtoms, NumRings].

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

Raises:

None – Parsing errors are suppressed; problematic SMILES are omitted.

admet.data.load_blinded_dataset(path)[source]

Load blinded test CSV with identifier and structure only.

Parameters:

path (pathlib.Path) – CSV path containing required columns ['Molecule Name', 'SMILES'].

Returns:

DataFrame restricted to provided columns (additional cols retained).

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame

Raises:

ValueError – If required columns are missing.

admet.data.load_dataset(root, *, endpoints=None, n_fingerprint_bits=2048)[source]

Public wrapper to load a Hugging Face dataset splits directory.

Parameters:

  • root (pathlib.Path) – Directory containing a saved DatasetDict.

  • endpoints (Sequence[str], optional) – Subset of endpoint columns to retain.

  • n_fingerprint_bits (int, optional) – Fingerprint bit length (affects expected columns).

Returns:

Loaded splits and metadata.

Return type:

LoadedDataset

admet.data.parallel_canonicalize_smiles(smiles_list, isomeric=True, max_workers=None)[source]

Canonicalise many SMILES strings concurrently.

A thread pool is used with a heuristic for worker count (min(32, cpu+4)) similar to the default used by concurrent.futures. Ordering of the output list matches the input ordering exactly.

Parameters:

  • smiles_list (Iterable) – Iterable of raw SMILES strings.

  • isomeric (bool, optional) – Preserve isomeric information, by default True.

  • max_workers (int | None, optional) – Explicit thread count; None applies an automatic heuristic.

Returns:

Canonical SMILES strings, with None for entries that failed.

Return type:

List[Optional[str]]

Raises:

None – All underlying errors are caught; per‑item failures produce None.
